verbose_text: The mGluR1 agonist, DHPG (1 muM), alone, significantly increased the amplitude of GABA B IPSCs (123.80% +/- 7.58% of control, n = 5; p < 0.05, paired t test; XREF_FIG), whereas the alpha 1 R agonist, phenylephrine (PE, 100 muM) did not affect these currents (96.52% +/- 5.60% of control, n = 8; p = 0.52, paired t test; XREF_FIG).
evidence: mGluR1 agonist, DHPG (1 muM), alone, significantly increased the amplitude of GABA
